Sludge used his tail to beat Laser Breath while Artemis fi=
red 25 times against Branded

OLF4

  Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 9:38 AM
 =
 Subject: Re: The bum and the hole...


  Laser Breath struck Branded causi=
ng her to lose her concentration. she could
  hear creaking and knew that t=
he roof was weekened by her attack. She pulled
  out a grenade, "Two words =
for you lizard breath BREATH MINT." she tosses the
  grenade toward the cha=
rging Dinobot, "Here have this one." She'd hoped that
  the monster attacki=
ng her was as dumb as he acted.

  The roof collapsed forcing the drunk to =
jump back, Branded transformed to
  her truck mode, "The battles lost Cybra=
ts, I'm getting out of here, you
  might want to do the same."
